```{r}
fd_fx <- D(expr = expression(x^2), name = "x")
x <- 3
eval(fd_fx)
```


```{r}
pd_pa <- D(expr = expression(2 * ((3 * a + 2) ^4) - 5), name = "a")
a <- 1.2
eval(pd_pa)
```
